org.dejava.component.validation.method

Class ArgFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.validation.method.ArgFormatter

  • public final class ArgFormatter
extends Object
    Provides some argument formatter methods. Can be used as some kind of pre validation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String removeInvalidRegex(String originalArgument, String invalidRegex)
      Removes the occurrences of some invalid regular expression from an original argument.
      static Collection<String> split(String initialList)
      Splits a string around matches of the "," token.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • removeInvalidRegex

        public static String removeInvalidRegex(String originalArgument,
                                        String invalidRegex)
        Removes the occurrences of some invalid regular expression from an original argument.
        Parameters:
        originalArgument - The original argument value.
        invalidRegex - The regular expression to be removed from the original argument value.
        Returns:
        The original argument value without the occurrences of the given regular expression.

      • split

        public static Collection<String> split(String initialList)
        Splits a string around matches of the "," token.
        Parameters:
        initialList - The initial string with the list content.
        Returns:
        The string split around matches of the "," token.
